The next person to compare Blockchain to TCP/IP gets a slap :-) #blockchainweek
Blockchain reminds me of all the kerfuffle about digital signatures in the 90's. The raw ignorance of PKI was a huge barrier to adoption.
The technical depth of the conference at #blockchainweek could only be measured by an electron microscope
Haha, latest presentation tactic, show your customer list slide and them zip forward before anyone can take a picture #blockchainweek
So, the blockchain market is a hot mess of stuff, chaotic for sure, but what alignment, good, neutral or evil? #blockchainweek
"every bitcoin txn costs 1.6 households worth of energy" #blockchainweek
So who is is making shovels in the Blockchain gold rush ? #blockchainweek
Day 2 of the #blockchainweek now "state of the industry" and yes, you guessed right, its a panel.
@Gert_at_work any time Gert, you missed our Berlin MuG :-)
We have an @MongoDB meetup happening in Milan on Wednesday. Find out what's new in 3.4 https://t.co/xbF7AySjLf
@j32804 the panel flapped around without really answering :-(
@hickey_paul @Entirl its a broadcast only account
@hickey_paul @Entirl haha no chance, Paul, they just ignore awkward questions
We have a @MongoDB User Group in Dublin this week on Thursday , @sos100 will talking about the Beacon Ecosystem https://t.co/QF22d8vuLI
Goto to China, its a bigger market and they care about your more than the US #blockchainweek 1.4bn people
"IoT devices have really crappy security. Can Blockchain help provide a device identity layer?" #blockchainweek
Next panel : Blockchain for IoT and Insurance, these topics are linked ? #blockchainweek
"Design your iCO token to fail the Howey Test" #blockchainweek
regulators can look back 5 years so current ICOs may be subject to legal challenge #blockchainweek
ICO's can be registered as a securities, just make sure your lawyers understand securities law #blockchainweek
So bad ICOs are like bad kickstarter projects. When run by neophytes the businesses cannot deliver a product or a market #blockchainweek
Clash of the titans, the fundamental disjunction between centralised regulation and distributed consensus #blockchainweek
IF you pass the "Howey Test" you are a security, therefore the SEC will come after you #blockchainweek https://t.co/ub8KcFupZm
There is a Mr Angry on the panel. Awesome! #blockchainweek "You are going to go to jail!"
"The SEC may come after you is you make your ICO look like an IPO rather than crowd funding". "Are they a security?" #blockchainweek
An Initial Coin Offering, is like an IPO, but you get tokens instead of shares #blockchainweek sounds like a kickstarter enabler
Next up Initial Coin Offerings (ICO), I hope some tells us what these are #blockchainweek
Oh look, another panel #blockchainweek #panelweek
This panel thinks we should depend on the regulators for security, in the words of Charile Brown "Good Grief" #blockchainweek
So code has bugs. Deep wisdom from this panel #blockchainweek
"How did the DAO attack affect smart contracts" #blockchainweek
"Need to limit exposure of data in public ledgers" #blockchainweek
"Putting data in a blockchain is putting it in a timelock" #blockchainweek
"Repackage proven technology is the key to blockchain success" @BlockchainWeek
"Can shared source work"? "Open Source not always tested". OpenSSL anyone? :-) #blockchainweek
@jdrumgoole "for cryptographic stacks we need open source to ensure security"
"How should enterprises decide amongst open source vs closed source blockchain stacks? " #blockchainweek
If you want to run a conference panel put a picture above each panellist's head with his twitter handle on it #blockchainweek
Panels are a lazy conference device and there are a *lot* of them at this conference #blockchainweek
Next panel is on scaling distributed ledgers #blockchainweek
Great presentation from @bobbyclee jbest bitcoin mob of the show so far :-) #blockchainweek
Here's the pitch "Mobi, instant currency conversion" #blockchainweek
@mikebutcher talk to Bobby Lee of BTCC, its his quote
So Bobby Lee of BTCC easily the best presenter of the day so far #blockchainweek all the recent tweet quotes since lunchtime are his
"Money will not be 'region locked' in the future" #blockchainweek
"Blockchain's killer app is bitcoin, bitcoin's killer app is money" #blockchainweek
"Bitcoin is a new revolutionary global asset class" #blockchainweek
Only 1800 bitcoina created per day by miners #blockchainweek
What is bitcoin, investment, speculation or straight up gambling? #blockchainweek
70% of bitcoin miners are based in China #blockchainweek
@dgwbirch agree, but I can't see copyright owners giving in to that without notice a fight
@thomaspower @TeamBlockchain I just quote the speakers. Right now I have very few opinions, which is unusual for me !
"Can blockchain handle the transaction rates of the music industry'' @BenjiKRogers, probably not he says. #blockchainweek
Collectors, art houses and artists all have needs #blockchainweek but they don't like the idea of a public ledger #notprivate
Link the artist the distributor and the owner says @tomtoumazis #blockchainweek via a tag that lasts 150 years.
90% of art traded every year is "primary" i.e. brand new #blockchainweek
previous comments on the music industry were all from @BenjiKRogers #blockchainweek
The (music content) industry does not know what it owns #blockchainweek Use blockchain to track and audit ownership.
Content creators are not identified in the digital content they created #blockchainweek
DonorCoin : Fix aid leakage by removing cash from the system. Use blockchain to provide tokens. #blockchainweek https://t.co/VQsZtDUy7q
Lots of people on stage professing no knowledge of Blockchain :-( #blockchainweek
https://t.co/IKEmfzxLsL uses block chain to replace wire transfers with low cost transfers via blockchain/bitcoin #blockchainweek
Tallysticks.io uses blockchain to deliver low cost invoice financing #blockchainweek
